en-US.alert_about: Run a selected shortcut in a continuous loop with options to minimize battery life and prevent early termination with Guided Access.
en-US.alert_run: Your shortcut will run repeatedly. If you never leave the Shortcuts app nor experience an error during execution, the shortcut will run until you stop Shortcuts.
en-US.alert_update_none: You are running the latest version of RepeatCuts.
en-US.prompt_brightness:
Set the screen brightness from 0 to 100 when running RepeatCuts.

Enter a number outside of that range to keep the brightness at its current value.
en-US.prompt_volume:
Set the volume from 0 to 100 when running RepeatCuts.

Enter a number outside of that range to keep the volume at its current value.
en-US.prompt_count:
Enter the number of times to run this shortcut.

Enter 0 to run the shortcut continuously.
en-US.prompt_delete: Delete this RepeatCut? This operation cannot be undone.
en-US.prompt_interval_value: Enter the number of {{INTERVALTYPE}} to wait between calls to the shortcut:
en-US.prompt_name: Enter a descriptive name for your new RepeatCut.
en-US.prompt_shortcut: Select a shortcut to run repeatedly:
en-US.prompt_callback: Do you want to use a custom callback shortcut with this shortcut?
en-US.prompt_callback_shortcut:
Select a shortcut to be used as a callback.

If the shortcut returns ❌❌❌, we will exit the loop.

Otherwise, the callback's return value will be used as input to the primary shortcut.
